Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem: 
As it's a birthday gift, deliveries must take place at the latest on May 24th - please make sure! Thank you

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

Has the customer's parcel been sent? The customer has contacted us because he is waiting for the shipment.
Thank you.

Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The parcel is currently on the way. The customer can check the progress of the delivery using the tracking link: https://www.ups.com/track?loc=de_de&requester=QUIC&tracknum=1ZBF1560D901114442/trackdetails
Thank you.

Regards,
